text: Imbued with the Spirit of Chaofeng
A hundred battles, crimson blood seeps through inky armor, gleaming blades shatter the wicked.
Nan-Gau summons heavenly fire, dragon flames blaze in all directions.
A unit armed with the new double-barreled blunderbuss from the Nan-Gau Celestial Foundry.
Ogre warriors blessed by the blood of Xing Tian, they are the best breakthrough specialists on the front line.
A ferocious beast forged by the Celestial Foundry in collaboration with the Astronomer Royal, imbued with the spirit of Chaofeng.
These Short Spearmen may not be well-trained, but they often participate in military drills.
The Earthshaker Terracotta Sentinels are another masterpiece of the Celestial Foundry, although it may seem unorthodox to traditional workshops.
Equipped with the new Celestial Foundry's charged musket-blade - the Divine Saltpeter Musket and the Xuan Dao, a unit composed of elites drawn from various units.
The Remnant Fire units are composed of experienced peasant archers, and disrupting enemy formations with residue rockets during battle is their specialty.
Still as a fortress, moving like a mountain!
Swift horses chase clouds across the snow, silver spears break formations and strike fear into the enemy.
Duality intertwined, hardness and softness combined.
The Dragonfang Bloodguard's sword-lances can be used for both offense and defense.
Every Bloodguard practices the Calm Heart Art to alleviate their killing intent, allowing them to face the enemy with greater composure.
Launch a surprise attack on the enemy under the Moon Empress's protection, shrouded in the shadows of the moon.
A special magazine crafted by the Celestial Artificers, capable of holding more ammunition.
Gunpowder developed by the Celestial Artificers, more powerful than ordinary gunpowder.
The Vanguard Musket Guard's equipment is forged by the Celestial Artificers using heavenly fire, making it exceptionally sturdy.
Blessed by the blood of Xing Tian, they become even more unyielding in the face of adversity.
Chaofeng has the power to ward off evil and dispel demons. Statues of Chaofeng are often placed on rooftops in Cathay to ward off evil spirits.
Crafted by the Celestial Artificers in collaboration with the Jade Court Astronomer Royal, the Inferno Armor must be exceptionally strong to contain the spirit of Chaofeng.
Reforge the Inferno Armor with spirit-infused flames.
Hold your ground! Fire at will!
Each strike of the Xuan Dao charges the Divine Saltpeter Musket.
Each shot from the Divine Saltpeter Musket preheats the Xuan Dao's blade, increasing its damage.
Arrows blessed by the Moon Empress can greatly disrupt the enemy's ranged attacks.
Lying awake at night, listening to the wind and rain, dreaming of iron horses crossing a frozen river.
The Mountainquaker Iron Cavalry's Guan Dao sweeps across the battlefield, unstoppable.
Charge into the enemy ranks, fight to the death in a hundred battles.

Yin and Yang generate each other, difficulty and ease complement each other, long and short define each other, high and low fill each other, sounds harmonize, front and back follow each other, this is the constant Way.
The cycle of Qian and Kun, when the negative reaches its extreme, the positive arises.
Effect strength increases with the number of enemy models in range.
Unit Capacity: +%n for Vanguard Musket Guard

The Dragonfang Bloodguard are known for their long sword-lances, black and silver armor, and blood-red cloaks. They are the most elite warriors under Yinglong's command, his sharpest claws and teeth, and the enemy's worst nightmare. Countless Chaos armies have fallen before this elite force. Every Dragonfang Bloodguard is a warrior tempered in mountains of corpses and seas of blood, and their lifelong pursuit is to follow Yinglong in conquering all invaders.

Founded by Master Gongshu Ye, the Nan-Gau Celestial Foundry produces weapons and armor far superior to those of ordinary forges. The Vanguard Musket Guard's equipment is Master Gongshu Ye's proudest creation. To craft this new set of equipment, Gongshu Ye harnessed the heavenly fire of Nan-Gau's volcano as his forge and used meteoric iron as the primary material. After expending tremendous effort, he finally completed the Dragonfire Musket and Vanguard Armor, fulfilling his promise to Yinglong. The sound of the Vanguard Musket Guard's muskets has become the most chilling sound outside the Great Bastion.

Although the Thunderfire Gunners' Thunderfire Muskets are replicas of the Dragonfire Muskets and use less rare materials for mass production, they still have their unique advantages. Due to their ease of maintenance, the Celestial Foundry adjusted their ammunition composition, making them more effective at piercing enemy armor and better suited for coordinated combat with Jade Warrior units.

The Xing Tian Guard is composed of Ogres bestowed with the Blood of Xing Tian. Many of them fight against Chaos north of the Great Bastion in exchange for delicious food and generous rewards from Grand Cathay. After witnessing Xing Tian's heroic combat prowess, they were deeply impressed and gradually gathered around him. Xing Tian shared his power with them, and thus the Xing Tian Guard gradually took shape.

Although the Inferno Chaofeng was inspired by the Chaos Dwarfs' war beasts, it has been improved by Master Gongshu Ye of the Celestial Foundry, discarding the evil design of imprisoning daemons as a power source. The Celestial Foundry, in collaboration with the Jade Court Astronomer Royal, sought the spirit power from the Soul-Dragon, who bestowed the spirit of Chaofeng upon the beast. With this as its core, this war beast not only possesses the might to trample any battlefield but also has the power to dispel evil and purify for its allies.

Many members of the Spearman unit are farmers who engage in military training during their free time. They are trained by retired Jade Warrior soldiers, focusing on self-defense and delaying the enemy's advance.

Although the Earthshaker Terracotta Sentinel is considered an unorthodox design by traditional foundries, no one can deny that it is a perfect combination of artillery and Terracotta Sentinel, nor can anyone ignore its terrifying firepower and battlefield deterrence. The reputation of the Celestial Foundry has been built upon such bold and innovative designs.

The Divine Saltpeter Musket and the Xuan Dao are the latest achievements of the Celestial Foundry. Energy flows between the musket and the blade. Each strike of the Xuan Dao charges the musket, while the heat generated by the musket's firing preheats the Xuan Dao's blade, resulting in even greater destructive power. Mastering the balance of this flow is not easy, so the Divine Saltpeter Bladeguard are all carefully selected warriors from the Dragon Guard, each skilled in both sword and musket combat.

The Moon Empress favors archery and often teaches archery to the people of Grand Cathay. As a result, everyone in Cathay is skilled with bows and crossbows. The Remnant Fire units are composed of experienced archers, each with exceptional archery skills. The Moon Empress has granted them Moon Shadow Arrows for protection, and their commonly used Residue Rockets, produced by the Celestial Foundry, are their weapon of choice for disrupting enemy formations.

Still as a fortress, moving like a mountain! exclaimed Master Qinglian after witnessing the Mountainquaker Iron Cavalry in action. The Mountainquaker Iron Cavalry undergoes harsh training year-round on the windswept plains outside the Great Bastion. They and their horses are clad in black armor, wielding Guan Dao, fearless and unwavering. No matter how powerful the enemy, they charge forward without hesitation.

North of the Great Bastion, long ravaged by Chaos daemons, they often raided the Cathayan border, plundering and then leaving, exhausting the Cathayan defenders. Until one day, the alerted garrison found a Norscan raider force pinned to death by silver spears outside a village. Survivors from the village said they were saved by a group of righteous cavalry riding white horses. From then on, the name "Cloud Chasing Cavalry" gradually spread outside the Great Bastion, becoming a nightmare for Chaos raiders.

Yin and Yang harmony is the foundation of Grand Cathay. These powerful Yin Yang Stone Lions are the culmination of Yin Yang beast magic, and every Dualforce Lion Guard is also skilled in wielding dual iron whips. They are all dressed in black robes and silver armor, their black and white whips capable of both offense and defense in battle. Skilled in manipulating Yin and Yang energies, they can even achieve a seamless flow of Yin and Yang in combat, ensuring their stamina never runs out.
